ack.p: We thank Professor Xiaoyu Sun, Dr. Xuebo Sang, and Director Xuefeng Lu for supporting the blood sample collection.

sec.title: Funding
sec.p: This work was supported by the National Natural Science Foundation of China (Grant No. 31702270) and the Provincial Natural Science Foundation of Heilongjiang, China (Grant No. H2016102). The design of this study, sample collections and data analysis were supported by Grant H2016102. The writing of this manuscript was aided by Grant 31702270.

sec.title: Availability of data and materials
sec.p: The datasets used and analyzed during the current study are available from the corresponding author on reasonable request.
